2023-11-30T22:23:41.467Z.name: George Donnelly
2023-11-30T22:23:41.467Z.description: I'm a content writer, project manager, Web3 coder, sci-fi author, weekend hiker and dad. I'm an idealistic pioneer in Bitcoin & Web3 adoption who's known for taking the initiative and inspiring people. I've delivered more than $5.5mm in global projects.
